summary: A rockumentary about the Canadian rock band Barenaked Ladies's life, in a nutshell.
cast: Steven Page|Ed Robertson|Jim Creeggan|Tyler Stewart|Kevin Hearn|Chris Brown|Jeff Goldblum|Zorianna Kit|Terry David Mulligan|Conan O'Brien|Jason Priestley|Andy Richter|Dan Seaver|Jon Stewart|Moses Znaimer
keywords: rockumentary|rock band|country name in title|independent film
title: Barenaked in America
